Uses of Class
edu.iastate.cs228.hw4.Point

    • Uses of Point in edu.iastate.cs228.hw4

      Fields in edu.iastate.cs228.hw4 declared as Point 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Point[] ConvexHull.hullVertices
      Vertices of the convex hull in counterclockwise order are stored in the array hullVertices[], with hullVertices[0] storing lowestPoint.
      protected Point ConvexHull.lowestPoint
      Lowest point from points[]; and in case of a tie, the leftmost one of all such points.
      protected Point[] ConvexHull.pointsNoDuplicate
      This array stores the same set of points from points[] with all duplicates removed.
